await helloworld.x()
await helloworld.setX(3)
const helloworld = await HelloWorld.attach('0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3')
 const HelloWorld = await ethers.getContractFactory("HelloWorld");
clear
await helloworld.x()
await helloworld.getX(3)
await helloworld.setX(3)
await helloworld.getx()
const helloworld = await HelloWorld.attach('0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3')
 const HelloWorld = await ethers.getContractFactory("HelloWorld");
